mapper.insert: insert into blogs(title, description, content, created, status, label,user_id) values(#{blogDao.title}, #{blogDao.description}, #{blogDao.content}, #{blogDao.created}, #{blogDao.status}, #{blogDao.label},#{blogDao.userId})
mapper.update: update blogs set title=#{blogDao.title}, description=#{blogDao.description}, content=#{blogDao.content}, created=#{blogDao.created}, status=#{blogDao.status}, label=#{blogDao.label}, user_id=#{blogDao.userId} where id = #{blogDao.id}
mapper.select: select * from blogs order by created desc
